tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClothingInventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
log_type VARCHAR(50),
log_date DATE,
quantity_changed INT,
FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(id));

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity_in_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    item_price DECIMAL,
    quantity_in_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_location VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_address VARCHAR(100),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    shipping_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE warehouses (
    warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT NOT NULL,
    current_inventory INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    item_id INT REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id),
    quantity_changed INT NOT NULL,
    warehouse_id INT REFERENCES warehouses(warehouse_id)
);
